text: Somogyvámos is a Hungarian village located around 30 kilometres south of Lake Balaton. In 2019 around 800 people lived in the village. The village attracts around 30000 annual tourists, mainly because of the popularity of the Krisna Valley eco-village, which is near Somogyvamos. The ruins of a 13th century church are located near the village, and attract many visitors each year. == References == Category:Villages in Hungary
title: Somogyvámos
